title: Home and Away actress Ada Nicodemou, 42, looks stunning in a makeup-free selfie
text:
Australian actor Ada Nicodemou has shared her latest makeup-free selfie on her Instagram and amazed her fans.

The long-time Home and Away actress uploaded the image taken in Hyde Park within Sydney's CBD on Friday to welcome Summer season.

The 42-year-old can be seen casually dressed in a loose summer dress, her hair let down and particularly held up by her sunglasses.

'Very excited for summer!' Home and Away actress Ada Nicodemou, 42, (pictured) looked stunning in a makeup-free selfie shared with fans on Thursday

'Such a gorgeous day in Sydney today, it's getting me very excited for summer,' she captioned the post.

The post attracted swarms of comments by people complimenting the actress for the warm summery look despite her bare appearance.

One fan commented: 'Gorgeous lady!' while another chimed in: Stunningly beautiful'.

Another admirer wrote: ' You look beautiful as always and gorgeous eyes'.

Wedding date: Last week, Ada glammed up with a full face of make-up at a friend's wedding in Bowral, alongside partner Adam Rigby (left)

Glam pair! The smiling couple posed for a series of selfies, with Ada looking stunning in what appeared to have been a plunging black sequin dress

Last week, Ada glammed up with a full face of make-up at a friend's wedding in Bowral, alongside partner Adam Rigby.

Ada shared a series of photos of herself cosying up to her longtime millionaire boyfriend.

The smiling couple posed for a series of selfies, with Ada looking stunning in what appeared to have been a plunging black sequin dress.

Loved up! Speaking on KIIS FM's Kyle and Jackie Show back in June, Ada revealed she thinks Adam is 'The One'

Speaking on KIIS FM's Kyle and Jackie Show back in June, Ada revealed she thinks Adam is 'The One'.

'I'm really happy at the moment, everything's really good in my life,' she told the radio program.

But Ada has previously shot down rumours she is engaged to the businessman.

'Do you see a ring on my finger? No, sorry, nothing to tell. But I had a great holiday,' she said on The Morning Show earlier this year.
description: Australian actor Ada Nicodemou has shared her latest makeup-free selfie on her Instagram and amazed her fans.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
